00015         template<typename T, precision P>
00016         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNull(detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00017         {
00018                 bool result = true;
00019                 for(length_t i = 0; result && i < 2 ; ++i)
00020                         result = isNull(m[i], epsilon);
00021                 return result;
00022         }

00027                 bool result = true;

00035         {
00036                 bool result = true;
00037                 for(length_t i = 0; result && i < 4 ; ++i)

00042         template<typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00043         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isIdentity(matType<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00044         {
00045                 bool result = true;
00046                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m[0].length(); ++i)
00047                 {
00048                         for(length_t j(0); result && j < i ; ++j)
00049                                 result = abs(m[i][j]) <= epsilon;
00050                         if(result)
00051                                 result = abs(m[i][i] - 1) <= epsilon;
00052                         for(length_t j(i + 1); result && j < m.length(); ++j)
00053                                 result = abs(m[i][j]) <= epsilon;
00054                 }
00055                 return result;
00056         }
00057 
00058         template<typename T, precision P>
00059         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNormalized(detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00060         {
00061                 bool result(true);
00062                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00063                         result = isNormalized(m[i], epsilon);
00064                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00065                 {
00066                         typename detail::tmat2x2<T, P>::col_type v;
00067                         for(length_t j(0); j < m.length(); ++j)
00068                                 v[j] = m[j][i];
00069                         result = isNormalized(v, epsilon);
00070                 }
00071                 return result;
00072         }
00073 
00074         template<typename T, precision P>
00075         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNormalized(detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00076         {
00077                 bool result(true);
00078                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00079                         result = isNormalized(m[i], epsilon);
00080                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00081                 {
00082                         typename detail::tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type v;
00083                         for(length_t j(0); j < m.length(); ++j)
00084                                 v[j] = m[j][i];
00085                         result = isNormalized(v, epsilon);
00086                 }
00087                 return result;
00088         }

00090         template<typename T, precision P>
00091         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNormalized(detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00092         {
00093                 bool result(true);
00094                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00095                         result = isNormalized(m[i], epsilon);
00096                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length(); ++i)
00097                 {
00098                         typename detail::tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type v;
00099                         for(length_t j(0); j < m.length(); ++j)
00100                                 v[j] = m[j][i];
00101                         result = isNormalized(v, epsilon);
00102                 }
00103                 return result;
00104         }

00106         template<typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00107         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isOrthogonal(matType<T, P> const & m, T const & epsilon)
00108         {
00109                 bool result(true);
00110                 for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length() - 1; ++i)
00111                 for(length_t j(i + 1); result && j < m.length(); ++j)
00112                         result = areOrthogonal(m[i], m[j], epsilon);
00113 
00114                 if(result)
00115                 {
00116                         matType<T, P> tmp = transpose(m);
00117                         for(length_t i(0); result && i < m.length() - 1 ; ++i)
00118                         for(length_t j(i + 1); result && j < m.length(); ++j)
00119                                 result = areOrthogonal(tmp[i], tmp[j], epsilon);
00120                 }
00121                 return result;
00122         }
